Topic.Title: Newbie javascript in output Window Desktopversion

Posts.EditableText:
Hi!
I'm new with squiffy and I like it so far. But Javascript is (until now) strange for me. So I tested some script snippets within the Win Desktop Client but, Output Window on RUN doesn't show the correct output from java. After BUILD and separately open .html file in chrome, it works.
Is that correct or is that a bug in win client?

Regards
Dax
